name: <template_name>
template_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format" xmlns:barcode="http://barcode4j.krysalis.org/ns" version="1.1" exclude-result-prefixes="fo">
    <xsl:output method="xml" version="1.0" omit-xml-declaration="no" indent="yes"/>
    <!--<xsl:variable name="refRep" select="//refRep"/>-->
    <xsl:variable name="header" select="//packing_slip"/>
    <xsl:template match="/">
        <fo:root>
            <fo:layout-master-set>
                <fo:simple-page-master master-name="letter" page-height="8.5in" page-width="11in" margin-top="0.2in" margin-bottom="0.2in" margin-left="0.3in" margin-right="0.4in">
                    <fo:region-body margin-top="4.5in" margin-bottom="1.3in"/>
                    <fo:region-before precedence="true" extent="1in"/>
                    <fo:region-after precedence="true" extent="0.2in"/>
                    <!--  <fo:region-end precedence="true" extent="2.9in" /> -->
                </fo:simple-page-master>

                <fo:page-sequence-master master-name="default">
                    <fo:repeatable-page-master-reference master-reference="letter"/>
                </fo:page-sequence-master>
            </fo:layout-master-set>


            <xsl:for-each select=".//items[1]">
                <fo:page-sequence master-reference="default">
                    <fo:static-content flow-name="xsl-region-before">
                        <xsl:call-template name="logoAddresses"/>
                        <xsl:call-template name="shipTo"/>
                    </fo:static-content>

                    <fo:static-content flow-name="xsl-region-after">
                        <xsl:call-template name="emptyTable"/>
                        <xsl:call-template name="footer"/>
                    </fo:static-content>
                    <fo:flow flow-name="xsl-region-body">
                        <xsl:call-template name="item-table"/>
                        <fo:block id="lastPage"/>
                    </fo:flow>
                </fo:page-sequence>
            </xsl:for-each>
        </fo:root>
    </xsl:template>

    <xsl:template name="footer" margin-right="0.4in" background-color="white">
        <fo:block-container>
            <fo:block font-weight="bold" font-size="30" text-align="right" margin-right="0.15in">
                <fo:external-graphic content-width="5in">
                    <xsl:attribute name="src"> url('maps/c/csnStores/api/images/bottom.JPG') </xsl:attribute>
                </fo:external-graphic>
            </fo:block>

        </fo:block-container>
    </xsl:template>
    <xsl:template name="logoAddresses">
        <fo:block>
            <fo:table font-size="10pt" background-color="white">
                <fo:table-column column-width="60%"/>
                <!--  <fo:table-column column-width="90%" />
                -->
                <fo:table-body>
                    <fo:table-row>
                        <fo:table-cell padding="2mm">
                            <fo:block font-weight="bold" font-size="30" text-align="left" margin-top="-7mm" margin-left="5mm">
                                <fo:external-graphic content-width="2.2in">
                                    <xsl:attribute name="src"> url('maps/c/csnStores/api/images/logo1.png') </xsl:attribute>
                                </fo:external-graphic>
                            </fo:block>
                        </fo:table-cell>
                    </fo:table-row>
                </fo:table-body>
            </fo:table>
        </fo:block>
    </xsl:template>
    <xsl:template name="shipTo">
        <fo:block>
            <fo:table background-color="white">
                <fo:table-column column-width="25%"/>
                <fo:table-column column-width="25%"/>
                <fo:table-column column-width="50%"/>
                <fo:table-body>
                    <fo:table-row>
                        <fo:table-cell border="1pt solid grey" padding="0.5mm" margin-right="0in" background-color="#c0c0c0" number-columns-spanned="2">

                            <fo:block font-size="9" text-align="left" font-weight="bold" background-color="#c0c0c0" margin-left="2mm">ORDER INFORMATION</fo:block>

                        </fo:table-cell>
                        <fo:table-cell margin-left="2mm" number-rows-spanned="4">
                            <fo:block font-weight="bold" margin-top="-1mm">
                                <fo:external-graphic content-width="4.8in">
                                    <xsl:attribute name="src"> url('maps/c/csnStores/api/images/thanks.JPG') </xsl:attribute>
                                </fo:external-graphic>
                            </fo:block>

                        </fo:table-cell>
                    </fo:table-row>
                    <fo:table-row>

                        <fo:table-cell border="1pt solid grey" padding="0.5mm" margin-right="0in" number-columns-spanned="2">
                            <fo:block font-size="9" padding-top="2mm" margin-left="2mm">Page: <fo:page-number/> of <fo:page-number-citation ref-id="lastPage"/> • Package: <xsl:value-of select="$header/pack_number"/>  of <xsl:value-of select="$header/pack_total"/> • Order Date: <xsl:value-of select="$header/purchase_order_date"/></fo:block>
                            <fo:block font-size="9" margin-left="2mm">P.O. Number:  <xsl:value-of select="$header/purchase_order_number"/></fo:block>
                            <fo:block font-size="9" margin-left="2mm" padding-bottom="7mm">Shipped Via: <xsl:value-of select="$header/carrier/description"/> </fo:block>
                        </fo:table-cell>
                    </fo:table-row>
                    <fo:table-row>
                        <fo:table-cell border="1pt solid grey" padding="0.5mm" margin-right="0in" background-color="#c0c0c0">
                            <fo:block margin-left="2mm" font-size="9" text-align="left" font-weight="bold">SHIPPED TO</fo:block>

                        </fo:table-cell>
                        <fo:table-cell border="1pt solid grey" padding="0.5mm" margin-right="0in" background-color="#c0c0c0">
                            <fo:block margin-left="2mm" font-size="9" text-align="left" font-weight="bold">BILLED TO</fo:block>

                        </fo:table-cell>


                    </fo:table-row>
                    <fo:table-row>
                        <fo:table-cell border="1pt solid grey" margin-right="0in" padding-bottom="0mm">
                            <fo:block font-size="9">
                                <xsl:for-each select="$header/ship_to_address">
                                    <fo:block margin-left="2mm"><xsl:value-of select="./name"/> </fo:block>
                                    <fo:block  margin-left="2mm" font-size="9"  ><xsl:value-of select="./warehouse_number"/></fo:block>
                                    <xsl:choose>
                                        <xsl:when test="string-length(./address2) > 0">
                                            <fo:block margin-left="2mm"><xsl:value-of select="./address1"/> </fo:block>
                                            <fo:block margin-left="2mm"><xsl:value-of select="./address2"/> </fo:block>
                                        </xsl:when>
                                        <xsl:otherwise>
                                            <fo:block margin-left="2mm"><xsl:value-of select="./address1"/> </fo:block>
                                        </xsl:otherwise>
                                    </xsl:choose>
                                    <fo:block margin-left="2mm">
                                        <xsl:value-of select="./city"/>, <xsl:value-of select="./state"/> <xsl:value-of select="./postal_code"/> <xsl:value-of select="./country"/>
                                    </fo:block>
                                </xsl:for-each>
                            </fo:block>
                        </fo:table-cell>
                        <fo:table-cell border="1pt solid grey" margin-right="0in" padding-bottom="0mm">

                            <fo:block font-size="9" margin-left="2mm">
                                <xsl:for-each select="$header/bill_to_address">
                                    <fo:block margin-left="2mm"><xsl:value-of select="./name"/> </fo:block>
                                    <xsl:choose>
                                        <xsl:when test="string-length(./address2) > 0">
                                            <fo:block margin-left="2mm"><xsl:value-of select="./address1"/> </fo:block>
                                            <fo:block margin-left="2mm"><xsl:value-of select="./address2"/> </fo:block>
                                        </xsl:when>
                                        <xsl:otherwise>
                                            <fo:block margin-left="2mm"><xsl:value-of select="./address1"/> </fo:block>
                                        </xsl:otherwise>
                                    </xsl:choose>
                                    <fo:block margin-left="2mm">
                                        <xsl:value-of select="./city"/>, <xsl:value-of select="./state"/> <xsl:value-of select="./postal_code"/> <xsl:value-of select="./country"/>
                                    </fo:block>
                                </xsl:for-each>
                            </fo:block>
                        </fo:table-cell>

                    </fo:table-row>
                </fo:table-body>
            </fo:table>
        </fo:block>
        <fo:block text-align="center" padding-top="2mm"> Returns are easy at <fo:inline font-weight="bold">wayfair.com/returns •</fo:inline> For help or questions visit<fo:inline font-weight="bold"> wayfair.com/help</fo:inline>
        </fo:block>
    </xsl:template>
    <xsl:template name="item-table">
        <fo:block font-size="10">
            <fo:table>
                <fo:table-column column-width="20%"/>
                <fo:table-column column-width="9%"/>
                <fo:table-column column-width="69%"/>
                <fo:table-header>
                    <fo:table-row text-align="center" padding-top="0.2in" padding-right="100mm" font-size="10" border-bottom-style="solid" border-bottom-width="0.40mm">
                        <fo:table-cell padding="1mm" font-weight="bold" text-align="center" background-color="#c0c0c0">
                            <fo:block> ITEM # </fo:block>
                        </fo:table-cell>
                        <fo:table-cell padding="1mm" font-weight="bold" text-align="center" background-color="#c0c0c0">
                            <fo:block> QTY </fo:block>
                        </fo:table-cell>
                        <fo:table-cell padding="1mm" font-weight="bold" text-align="center" background-color="#c0c0c0">
                            <fo:block> DESCRIPTION </fo:block>
                        </fo:table-cell>
                    </fo:table-row>
                </fo:table-header>
                <fo:table-body>
                    <xsl:for-each select="//items/vendor_part_number">
                        <fo:table-row font-size="7.5">
                            <fo:table-cell padding-left="2mm" padding-top="2mm" text-align="center">
                                <fo:block-container overflow="hidden">
                                    <fo:block font-weight="plain">
                                        <xsl:value-of select="./../vendor_part_number"/>
                                    </fo:block>
                                </fo:block-container>
                            </fo:table-cell>
                            <fo:table-cell padding-left="1mm" padding-top="1mm" text-align="center">
                                <fo:block-container overflow="hidden">
                                    <fo:block font-weight="plain">
                                        <xsl:value-of select="./../ship_quantity"/>
                                    </fo:block>
                                </fo:block-container>
                            </fo:table-cell>
                            <fo:table-cell padding-left="1mm" padding-top="1mm" text-align="left">
                                <fo:block-container overflow="hidden">
                                    <fo:block font-weight="plain">
                                        <xsl:value-of select="./../product_description"/>
                                    </fo:block>
                                </fo:block-container>
                            </fo:table-cell>
                        </fo:table-row>
                    </xsl:for-each>
                </fo:table-body>
            </fo:table>
        </fo:block>
    </xsl:template>
    <xsl:template name="emptyTable">
        <fo:block font-size="10" margin-top="-80mm">
            <fo:table>
                <fo:table-column column-width="20%"/>
                <fo:table-column column-width="9%"/>
                <fo:table-column column-width="69%"/>

                <fo:table-body>

                    <fo:table-row height="2.4in" font-size="7" border-top-style="solid" border-top-width="0.40mm" border-bottom-style="solid" border-bottom-width="0.40mm">
                        <fo:table-cell padding-left="2mm" padding-top="2mm" text-align="center" border="solid 0.40mm grey">
                            <fo:block>   </fo:block>
                        </fo:table-cell>

                        <fo:table-cell padding-left="1mm" padding-top="1mm" text-align="left" border="solid 0.40mm grey">
                            <fo:block>   </fo:block>
                        </fo:table-cell>
                        <fo:table-cell padding-left="1mm" padding-top="1mm" text-align="left" border="solid 0.40mm grey">
                            <fo:block>   </fo:block>
                        </fo:table-cell>
                    </fo:table-row>
                </fo:table-body>
            </fo:table>
        </fo:block>
    </xsl:template>

    <xsl:template name="sum-qty">
        <xsl:param name="a"/>
        <!--list qty-->
        <xsl:param name="b"/>
        <!--number-->
        <xsl:param name="qty"/>
        <!--qty-->
        <xsl:param name="sum"/>

        <xsl:choose>
            <xsl:when test="(count($a) > 0)">
                <xsl:if test="($a[1] = $b)">
                    <xsl:call-template name="sum-qty">
                        <xsl:with-param name="a" select="$a[position() != 1]"/>
                        <xsl:with-param name="b" select="$b"/>
                        <xsl:with-param name="qty" select="$qty[position() != 1]"/>
                        <xsl:with-param name="sum" select="$sum + $qty[1]"/>
                    </xsl:call-template>
                </xsl:if>

                <xsl:if test="($a[1] != $b)">
                    <xsl:call-template name="sum-qty">
                        <xsl:with-param name="a" select="$a[position() != 1]"/>
                        <xsl:with-param name="b" select="$b"/>
                        <xsl:with-param name="qty" select="$qty[position() != 1]"/>
                        <xsl:with-param name="sum" select="$sum"/>
                    </xsl:call-template>
                </xsl:if>
            </xsl:when>

            <xsl:otherwise>
                <xsl:value-of select="$sum"/>
            </xsl:otherwise>
        </xsl:choose>
    </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
